name: MindManager XML Slide Deck
summary: Learn about .XMDECK files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: MindManager allows you to create various types of mind maps, such as tree maps, Venn diagrams, and timelines, to organize, visualize, and share ideas and complex processes. For example, you can use MindManager to outline the process of migrating data to a new database.
Corel introduced the MDECK and XMDECK file types when it released MindManager 21 in March 2021. You can create slide decks to organize and store slides based on mind maps for presentation purposes.
In Windows, MindManager saves XMDECK files in the following directory by default:

description: An XMDECK file is a collection of one or more slides created by Corel MindManager, an app for planning, visualizing, and sharing mind map diagrams. It stores slides comprised of branch or sub-branch topics and objects, such as icons and text, and may be made from scratch or elements in an existing MindManager Map. XMDECK files are similar to .MDECK files but saved in the XML standard instead of the binary MDECK format.

instructions: You can open an XMDECK file with Corel MindManager in Windows and macOS. To open the file, select File → Open.
Corel MindManager can convert XMDECK files to the following image formats:
To convert an XMDECK file, click the Slide Settings button (gear icon) in the Slides pane, then choose Export as Image(s).
